QuestData.Title: Direhorn or Devilsaur
QuestData.Description: We have an opportunity to disrupt the Zandalari war machine as well as have a little fun in the process.$b$bWithin these beast pens, a devilsaur and a direhorn are being outfitted with armor, their minds being enslaved to the Zandalari charms.$b$bGo into the camp and disrupt one of these binding rituals. It doesn't matter which one. Just kill those who are trying to bind the creature. This should let the fully armored beast run mad through the Zandalari camp. Then sit back and watch the hilarity ensue.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disrupt a binding ritual by killing all ritual NPCs around either a Defiant Direhorn or a Defiant Devilsaur.
